info.author: Ilya Shalyapin
info.description: # python-debug Useful debugging tools ## Installation pip install python-debug ## Save text to temp file >>> text = 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit...' >>> import pydebug >>> pydebug.save(text) '/tmp/tmpSTTRow' ## Use less from python console >>> text = 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit...' >>> import pydebug >>> pydebug.less(text) ## Use ack-grep from python console >>> text = 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit...' >>> import pydebug >>> pydebug.grep(text, '-i lorem') Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit... ## XML formatting >>> xml = u'hellow world' >>> import pydebug >>> pydebug.xmlprint(xml) hellow world ## Display readable unicode strings in iterable object >>> data = [u'лимон', u'апельсин', {u'фрукты':(u'мандарины',)}] >>> print data [u'\u043b\u0438\u043c\u043e\u043d', u'\u0430\u043f\u0435\u043b\u044c\u0441\u0438\u043d', {u'\u0444\u0440\u0443\u043a\u0442\u044b': (u'\u043c\u0430\u043d\u0434\u0430\u0440\u0438\u043d\u044b',)}] >>> pydebug.uprint(data) ["лимон", "апельсин", {"фрукты":("мандарины",),},] >>> pydebug.pprint(data) [u'лимон', u'апельсин', {u'фрукты': (u'мандарины',)}] >>>
info.name: python-debug
info.html_description:
# python-debug

Useful debugging tools

## Installation

pip install python-debug

## Save text to temp file

>>> text = 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit...'
>>> import pydebug
>>> pydebug.save(text)
'/tmp/tmpSTTRow'

## Use less from python console

>>> text = 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit...'
>>> import pydebug
>>> pydebug.less(text)

## Use ack-grep from python console

>>> text = 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit...'
>>> import pydebug
>>> pydebug.grep(text, '-i lorem')
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit...

## XML formatting

>>> xml = u'<data><item>hellow world</item></data>'
>>> import pydebug
>>> pydebug.xmlprint(xml)
<settings>
  <a>hellow world</a>
</settings>

## Display readable unicode strings in iterable object

>>> data = [u'лимон', u'апельсин', {u'фрукты':(u'мандарины',)}]
>>> print data
[u'\u043b\u0438\u043c\u043e\u043d', u'\u0430\u043f\u0435\u043b\u044c\u0441\u0438\u043d', {u'\u0444\u0440\u0443\u043a\u0442\u044b': (u'\u043c\u0430\u043d\u0434\u0430\u0440\u0438\u043d\u044b',)}]
>>> pydebug.uprint(data)
["лимон", "апельсин", {"фрукты":("мандарины",),},]
>>> pydebug.pprint(data)
[u'лимон',
 u'апельсин',
 {u'фрукты': (u'мандарины',)}]
>>>
